Inflicts damage on the attacker upon contact with
iron barbs.

zen-mode.name: zen-mode
zen-mode.effect:
This Pokémon switches between Standard Mode and Zen Mode after each turn depending on its HP.  Below 50% of its maximum HP, it switches to Zen Mode, and at 50% or above, it switches to Standard Mode.

This Pokémon returns to Standard Mode upon leaving battle or losing this ability.  This ability has no effect if this Pokémon is not a darmanitan.
zen-mode.shortEffect: Changes darmanitan's form after each turn depending on its HP: Zen Mode below 50% max HP, and Standard Mode otherwise.
zen-mode.flavorText:
Changes the Pokémon’s shape when HP is half
or less.

victory-star.name: victory-star
victory-star.effect: All friendly Pokémon's moves, including this Pokémon's own moves, have 1.1× their usual accuracy while this Pokémon is in battle.
victory-star.shortEffect: Increases moves' accuracy to 1.1× for friendly Pokémon.
victory-star.flavorText: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.

turboblaze.name: turboblaze
turboblaze.effect:
This Pokémon's moves completely ignore abilities that could hinder or prevent their effect on the target.

For example, this Pokémon's moves ignore abilities that would fully negate them, such as water absorb; abilities that would prevent any of their effects, such as clear body, shell armor, or sticky hold; and abilities that grant any general protective benefit, such as simple, snow cloak, or thick fat.  If an ability could either hinder or help this Pokémon's moves, e.g. dry skin or unaware, the ability is ignored either way.

Abilities that do not fit this description, even if they could hinder moves in some other way, are not affected.  For example, cursed body only affects potential future uses of the move, while liquid ooze and shadow tag can only hinder a move's effect on the user.  This ablity cannot ignore type or form changes granted by abilities, for example color change or forecast; nor effects that were caused by abilities but are no longer tied to an ability, such as the rain from drizzle.  This ability cannot ignore multitype at all.

An ability ignored by this ability is only nullified while the move is being used.  For example, this Pokémon's moves can paralyze a Pokémon with limber, but Limber will activate and heal the paralysis immediately thereafter, and this Pokémon's spikes are not affected by this ability after they have been placed.

When this Pokémon enters battle, all participating trainers are notified that it has this ability.

This ability functions identically to mold breaker and teravolt.
turboblaze.shortEffect: Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent moves.
turboblaze.flavorText: The Pokémon's moves are unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

teravolt.name: teravolt
teravolt.effect:
This Pokémon's moves completely ignore abilities that could hinder or prevent their effect on the target.

For example, this Pokémon's moves ignore abilities that would fully negate them, such as water absorb; abilities that would prevent any of their effects, such as clear body, shell armor, or sticky hold; and abilities that grant any general protective benefit, such as simple, snow cloak, or thick fat.  If an ability could either hinder or help this Pokémon's moves, e.g. dry skin or unaware, the ability is ignored either way.

Abilities that do not fit this description, even if they could hinder moves in some other way, are not affected.  For example, cursed body only affects potential future uses of the move, while liquid ooze and shadow tag can only hinder a move's effect on the user.  This ablity cannot ignore type or form changes granted by abilities, for example color change or forecast; nor effects that were caused by abilities but are no longer tied to an ability, such as the rain from drizzle.  This ability cannot ignore multitype at all.

An ability ignored by this ability is only nullified while the move is being used.  For example, this Pokémon's moves can paralyze a Pokémon with limber, but Limber will activate and heal the paralysis immediately thereafter, and this Pokémon's spikes are not affected by this ability after they have been placed.

When this Pokémon enters battle, all participating trainers are notified that it has this ability.

This ability functions identically to mold breaker and turboblaze.
teravolt.shortEffect: Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent moves.
teravolt.flavorText: The Pokémon's moves are unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

aroma-veil.name: aroma-veil
aroma-veil.effect: Protects allies against moves that affect their mental state.
aroma-veil.shortEffect: Protects allies against moves that affect their mental state.
aroma-veil.flavorText: Protects the Pokémon and its allies from effects that prevent the use of moves.

flower-veil.name: flower-veil
flower-veil.effect: Protects friendly grass Pokémon from having their stats lowered by other Pokémon.
flower-veil.shortEffect: Protects friendly grass Pokémon from having their stats lowered by other Pokémon.
flower-veil.flavorText: Ally Grass-type Pokémon are protected from status conditions and the lowering of their stats.

cheek-pouch.name: cheek-pouch
cheek-pouch.effect: Restores HP upon eating a Berry, in addition to the Berry's effect.
cheek-pouch.shortEffect: Restores HP upon eating a Berry, in addition to the Berry's effect.
cheek-pouch.flavorText: The Pokémon's HP is restored when it eats any Berry, in addition to the Berry's usual effect.

protean.name: protean
protean.effect:
Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses.

The type change takes place just before the move is used.
protean.shortEffect: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses.
protean.flavorText: Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's about to use. This works only once each time the Pokémon enters battle.

fur-coat.name: fur-coat
fur-coat.flavorText: Halves the damage from physical moves.

magician.name: magician
magician.effect: Steals the target's held item when the bearer uses a damaging move.
magician.shortEffect: Steals the target's held item when the bearer uses a damaging move.
magician.flavorText: The Pokémon steals the held item from any target it hits with a move.

bulletproof.name: bulletproof
bulletproof.effect: Protects against bullet, ball, and bomb-based moves.
bulletproof.shortEffect: Protects against bullet, ball, and bomb-based moves.
bulletproof.flavorText: Protects the Pokémon from ball and bomb moves.

competitive.name: competitive
competitive.effect: Raises Special Attack by two stages upon having any stat lowered.
competitive.shortEffect: Raises Special Attack by two stages upon having any stat lowered.
competitive.flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon's Sp. Atk stat sharply when its stats are lowered by an opposing Pokémon.

strong-jaw.name: strong-jaw
strong-jaw.effect: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5× their power.
strong-jaw.shortEffect: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5× their power.
strong-jaw.flavorText: The Pokémon's strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves.

refrigerate.name: refrigerate
refrigerate.effect: Turns the bearer's normal-type moves into ice-type moves.  Moves changed by this ability have 1.3× their power.
refrigerate.shortEffect: Turns the bearer's normal moves into ice moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.
refrigerate.flavorText:
Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves.
The power of those moves is boosted a little.

sweet-veil.name: sweet-veil
sweet-veil.flavorText: Prevents the Pokémon and its allies from falling asleep.

stance-change.name: stance-change
stance-change.effect: Changes aegislash to Blade Forme before using a damaging move, or Shield Forme before using kings shield.
stance-change.shortEffect: Changes aegislash to Blade Forme before using a damaging move, or Shield Forme before using kings shield.
stance-change.flavorText:
The Pokémon changes its form to Blade Forme when
it uses an attack move and changes to Shield Forme
when it uses King’s Shield.

gale-wings.name: gale-wings
gale-wings.effect: Raises flying moves' priority by one stage.
gale-wings.shortEffect: Raises flying moves' priority by one stage.
gale-wings.flavorText: Gives priority to the Pokémon's Flying-type moves while its HP is full.

mega-launcher.name: mega-launcher
mega-launcher.effect: Strengthens aura and pulse moves to 1.5× their power.
mega-launcher.shortEffect: Strengthens aura and pulse moves to 1.5× their power.

grass-pelt.name: grass-pelt
grass-pelt.effect: Boosts Defense while grassy terrain is in effect.
grass-pelt.shortEffect: Boosts Defense while grassy terrain is in effect.
grass-pelt.flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon's Defense stat on Grassy Terrain.

symbiosis.name: symbiosis
symbiosis.effect: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.
symbiosis.shortEffect: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.
symbiosis.flavorText: The Pokémon passes its held item to an ally that has used up an item.

tough-claws.name: tough-claws
tough-claws.effect: Strengthens moves that make contact to 1.33× their power.
tough-claws.shortEffect: Strengthens moves that make contact to 1.33× their power.
tough-claws.flavorText: Powers up moves that make direct contact.

pixilate.name: pixilate
pixilate.effect: Turns the bearer's normal-type moves into fairy moves.  Moves changed by this ability have 1.3× their power.
pixilate.shortEffect: Turns the bearer's normal moves into fairy moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.
pixilate.flavorText: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

gooey.name: gooey
gooey.effect: Lowers attacking Pokémon's Speed by one stage on contact.
gooey.shortEffect: Lowers attacking Pokémon's Speed by one stage on contact.
gooey.flavorText: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

aerilate.name: aerilate
aerilate.effect: Turns the bearer's normal-type moves into flying-type moves.  Moves changed by this ability have 1.3× their power.
aerilate.shortEffect: Turns the bearer's normal moves into flying moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.
aerilate.flavorText:
Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves.
The power of those moves is boosted a little.

parental-bond.name: parental-bond
parental-bond.effect: Lets the bearer hit twice with damaging moves.  The second hit has half power.
parental-bond.shortEffect: Lets the bearer hit twice with damaging moves.  The second hit has half power.

dark-aura.name: dark-aura
dark-aura.effect: Strengthens dark moves for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.
dark-aura.shortEffect: Strengthens dark moves to 1.33× their power for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.
dark-aura.flavorText: Powers up each Pokémon’s Dark-type moves.

fairy-aura.name: fairy-aura
fairy-aura.effect: Strengthens fairy moves for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.
fairy-aura.shortEffect: Strengthens fairy moves to 1.33× their power for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.
fairy-aura.flavorText: Powers up each Pokémon’s Fairy-type moves.

aura-break.name: aura-break
aura-break.effect: While this Pokémon is on the field, dark aura and fairy aura weaken moves of their respective types to 2/3 their power, rather than strengthening them.
aura-break.shortEffect: Makes dark aura and fairy aura weaken moves of their respective types.
aura-break.flavorText:
The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed
to lower the power of affected moves.

primordial-sea.name: primordial-sea
primordial-sea.effect:
When this Pokémon enters battle or gains this ability, the weather becomes heavy rain.  Heavy rain has all the properties of rain dance and also causes damaging Fire moves to fail.

Heavy rain ends when this Pokémon leaves battle or loses this ability, or when this ability is nullified.  The weather cannot otherwise be changed except by the effects of delta stream and desolate land.

air lock and cloud nine will prevent the effects of heavy rain, including allowing Fire moves to work, but will not allow the weather to be changed.
primordial-sea.shortEffect: Creates heavy rain, which has all the properties of Rain Dance, cannot be replaced, and causes damaging Fire moves to fail.
primordial-sea.flavorText:
The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify
Fire-type attacks.

desolate-land.name: desolate-land
desolate-land.effect:
When this Pokémon enters battle or gains this ability, the weather becomes extremely harsh sunlight.  Extremely harsh sunlight has all the properties of sunny day and also causes damaging Water moves to fail.

Extremely harsh sunlight ends when this Pokémon leaves battle or loses this ability, or when this ability is nullified.  The weather cannot otherwise be changed except by the effects of delta stream and primordial sea.

air lock and cloud nine will prevent the effects of extremely harsh sunlight, including allowing Water moves to work, but will not allow the weather to be changed.
desolate-land.shortEffect: Creates extremely harsh sunlight, which has all the properties of Sunny Day, cannot be replaced, and causes damaging Water moves to fail.
desolate-land.flavorText:
The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify
Water-type attacks.

delta-stream.name: delta-stream
delta-stream.effect:
When this Pokémon enters battle or gains this ability, the weather becomes a mysterious air current.  A mysterious air current causes moves to not be super effective against Flying; they do neutral damage instead.  anticipation and stealth rock are not affected.

The mysterious air current ends when this Pokémon leaves battle or loses this ability, or when this ability is nullified.  The weather cannot otherwise be changed except by the effects of desolate land and primordial sea.

air lock and cloud nine will prevent the effect of a mysterious air current, but will not allow the weather to be changed.
delta-stream.shortEffect: Creates a mysterious air current, which cannot be replaced and causes moves to never be super effective against Flying Pokémon.
delta-stream.flavorText:
The Pokémon changes the weather to eliminate all
of the Flying type’s weaknesses.

stamina.name: stamina
stamina.effect: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by one stage when it takes damage from a move.
stamina.shortEffect: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by one stage when it takes damage from a move.
stamina.flavorText: Boosts the Defense stat when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.

wimp-out.name: wimp-out
wimp-out.effect: After this Pokémon is hit by a move, if that move caused this Pokémon's HP to drop below half, it switches out.
wimp-out.shortEffect: This Pokémon automatically switches out when its HP drops below half.
wimp-out.flavorText:
The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP
becomes half or less.

emergency-exit.name: emergency-exit
emergency-exit.effect: After this Pokémon is hit by a move, if that move caused this Pokémon's HP to drop below half, it switches out.
emergency-exit.shortEffect: This Pokémon automatically switches out when its HP drops below half.
emergency-exit.flavorText:
The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its
HP becomes half or less.

water-compaction.name: water-compaction
water-compaction.effect: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by two stages when it's hit by a Water move.
water-compaction.shortEffect: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by two stages when it's hit by a Water move.
water-compaction.flavorText: Boosts the Defense stat sharply when the Pokémon is hit by a Water-type move.

merciless.name: merciless
merciless.effect: This Pokémon's moves critical hit against poisoned targets.
merciless.shortEffect: This Pokémon's moves critical hit against poisoned targets.
merciless.flavorText: The Pokémon's attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

shields-down.name: shields-down
shields-down.effect:
When this Pokémon enters battle and at the end of each turn, if its HP is 50% or above, it changes into Meteor Form; otherwise, it changes into Core Form.  In Meteor Form, it cannot be given a major status ailment (though existing ones are not cured), cannot become drowsy from yawn, and cannot use rest (which will simply fail).

This ability cannot be copied, replaced, or nullified.  This ability only takes effect for Minior.
shields-down.shortEffect: Transforms this Minior between Core Form and Meteor Form.  Prevents major status ailments and drowsiness while in Meteor Form.
shields-down.flavorText: When its HP drops to half or less, the Pokémon's shell breaks and it becomes aggressive.

stakeout.name: stakeout
stakeout.effect: This Pokémon's moves have double power against Pokémon that switched in this turn.
stakeout.shortEffect: This Pokémon's moves have double power against Pokémon that switched in this turn.
stakeout.flavorText: Doubles the damage dealt to a target that has just switched into battle.

water-bubble.name: water-bubble
water-bubble.effect: When this Pokémon is hit by a Fire move, the damage is halved.  When this Pokémon uses a Water move, the power is doubled. This Pokémon cannot be burned, and if it becomes burned, the burn is immediately cured.
water-bubble.shortEffect: Halves damage from Fire moves, doubles damage of Water moves, and prevents burns.
water-bubble.flavorText: Lowers the power of Fire-type moves that hit the Pokémon and prevents it from being burned.

steelworker.name: steelworker
steelworker.effect: This Pokémon's Steel moves have 1.5× power.
steelworker.shortEffect: This Pokémon's Steel moves have 1.5× power.

berserk.name: berserk
berserk.effect: Whenever this Pokémon takes damage from a move that causes its HP to drop below 50%, its Special Attack rises by one stage.
berserk.shortEffect: Raises this Pokémon's Special Attack by one stage every time its HP drops below half.
berserk.flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon's Sp. Atk stat when it takes a hit that causes its HP to drop to half or less.

slush-rush.name: slush-rush
slush-rush.effect: During Hail, this Pokémon has double Speed.
slush-rush.shortEffect: During Hail, this Pokémon has double Speed.
slush-rush.flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in snow.

long-reach.name: long-reach
long-reach.effect: A move used by this Pokémon will not make contact.
long-reach.shortEffect: This Pokémon's moves do not make contact.
long-reach.flavorText: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

liquid-voice.name: liquid-voice
liquid-voice.effect: When this Pokémon uses a move that is sound-based, that move's type is Water.

triage.name: triage
triage.effect: This Pokémon's healing moves have their priority increased by 3.
triage.shortEffect: This Pokémon's healing moves have their priority increased by 3.
triage.flavorText: Gives priority to the Pokémon's healing moves.

galvanize.name: galvanize
galvanize.effect: When this Pokémon uses a Normal moves, that move is Electric its power is 1.2×.
galvanize.shortEffect: This Pokémon's Normal moves are Electric and have their power increased to 1.2×.
galvanize.flavorText: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

surge-surfer.name: surge-surfer
surge-surfer.effect: Doubles this Pokémon's Speed on Electric Terrain.
surge-surfer.shortEffect: Doubles this Pokémon's Speed on Electric Terrain.
surge-surfer.flavorText: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed stat on Electric Terrain.

schooling.name: schooling
schooling.effect:
If this Pokémon is a wishiwashi and level 20 or above, then when it enters battle and at the start of each turn, it becomes Schooling Form if its HP is 25% or higher and Solo Form otherwise.

This ability cannot be replaced, copied, or nullified.
schooling.shortEffect: Wishiwashi becomes Schooling Form when its HP is 25% or higher.
schooling.flavorText:
When it has a lot of HP, the Pokémon forms a
powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP
is low.

disguise.name: disguise
disguise.effect:
If this Pokémon is in its Disguised Form and takes damage from a move, it switches to its Busted Form and the damage is prevented.  Other effects are not prevented.

This ability cannot be copied or replaced.  This ability only takes effect for Mimikyu.
disguise.shortEffect: Prevents the first instance of battle damage.
disguise.flavorText: Once per battle, the shroud that covers the Pokémon can protect it from an attack.

battle-bond.name: battle-bond
battle-bond.effect:
Transforms this Pokémon into Ash-Greninja after fainting an opponent.  Water Shuriken's power is 20 and always hits three times.

This ability cannot be copied or replaced.  This ability only takes effect for Greninja.
battle-bond.shortEffect: Transforms this Pokémon into Ash-Greninja after fainting an opponent.  Water Shuriken's power is 20 and always hits three times.
battle-bond.flavorText: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, its bond with its Trainer is strengthened, and its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats are boosted.

power-construct.name: power-construct
power-construct.effect:
Transforms 10% or 50% Zygarde into Complete Forme when its HP is below 50%.

This ability cannot be copied or replaced.  This ability only takes effect for Zygarde.
power-construct.shortEffect: Transforms 10% or 50% Zygarde into Complete Forme when its HP is below 50%.
power-construct.flavorText:
Other Cells gather to aid when its HP becomes
half or less. Then the Pokémon changes
its form to Complete Forme.

corrosion.name: corrosion
corrosion.effect: This Pokémon's moves and item ignore the usual immunity of Poison and Steel Pokémon when attempting to inflict poison.
corrosion.shortEffect: This Pokémon can inflict poison on Poison and Steel Pokémon.
corrosion.flavorText: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it's a Steel or Poison type.

comatose.name: comatose
comatose.effect: This Pokémon always acts as though it were Asleep.  It cannot be given another status ailment; it's unaffected by yawn; it can use sleep talk; and so on.
comatose.shortEffect: This Pokémon always  acts as though it were Asleep.
comatose.flavorText: The Pokémon is always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack while in its sleeping state.

queenly-majesty.name: queenly-majesty
queenly-majesty.effect: When an opposing Pokémon attempts to use a move that targets this Pokémon or an ally, and that move has priority, it will fail.
queenly-majesty.shortEffect: Opposing Pokémon cannot use priority attacks.
queenly-majesty.flavorText: When the Pokémon uses Surf or Dive, it will come back with prey. When it takes damage, it will spit out the prey to attack.

innards-out.name: innards-out
innards-out.effect: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.
innards-out.shortEffect: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.
innards-out.flavorText:
Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit
by the amount equal to its last HP.

dancer.name: dancer
dancer.effect: Whenever another Pokémon uses a dance move, this Pokémon will use the same move immediately afterwards.
dancer.shortEffect: Whenever another Pokémon uses a dance move, this Pokémon will use the same move immediately afterwards.
dancer.flavorText: Whenever a dance move is used in battle, the Pokémon will copy the user to immediately perform that dance move itself.

battery.name: battery
battery.effect: Ally Pokémon's moves have their power increased to 1.3×.
battery.shortEffect: Ally Pokémon's moves have their power increased to 1.3×.
battery.flavorText: Powers up ally Pokémon's special moves.

fluffy.name: fluffy
fluffy.effect: Damage from contact moves is halved.  Damage from Fire moves is doubled.
fluffy.shortEffect: Damage from contact moves is halved.  Damage from Fire moves is doubled.
fluffy.flavorText: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.

dazzling.name: dazzling
dazzling.effect: When an opposing Pokémon attempts to use a move that targets this Pokémon or an ally, and that move has priority, it will fail.
dazzling.shortEffect: Opposing Pokémon cannot use priority attacks.
dazzling.flavorText: The Pokémon dazzles its opponents, making them unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.

soul-heart.name: soul-heart
soul-heart.effect: This Pokémon's Special Attack rises by one stage every time any Pokémon faints.
soul-heart.shortEffect: This Pokémon's Special Attack rises by one stage every time any Pokémon faints.
soul-heart.flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon's Sp. Atk stat every time another Pokémon faints.

tangling-hair.name: tangling-hair
tangling-hair.effect: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.
tangling-hair.shortEffect: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.
tangling-hair.flavorText: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

receiver.name: receiver
receiver.effect: When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.
receiver.shortEffect: When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.
receiver.flavorText: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

power-of-alchemy.name: power-of-alchemy
power-of-alchemy.effect: When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.
power-of-alchemy.shortEffect: When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.
power-of-alchemy.flavorText: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

beast-boost.name: beast-boost
beast-boost.effect: Raises this Pokémon's highest stat by one stage when it faints another Pokémon.
beast-boost.shortEffect: Raises this Pokémon's highest stat by one stage when it faints another Pokémon.
beast-boost.flavorText:
The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each
time it knocks out a Pokémon.

rks-system.name: rks-system
rks-system.effect:
Changes this Pokémon's type to match its held Memory.

This ability cannot be copied, replaced, or nullified.  This ability only takes effect for Silvally.
rks-system.shortEffect: Changes this Pokémon's type to match its held Memory.
rks-system.flavorText:
Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the
memory disc it holds.

electric-surge.name: electric-surge
electric-surge.effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to electric terrain.
electric-surge.shortEffect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Electric Terrain.
electric-surge.flavorText: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

psychic-surge.name: psychic-surge
psychic-surge.effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to psychic terrain.
psychic-surge.shortEffect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Psychic Terrain.
psychic-surge.flavorText: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

misty-surge.name: misty-surge
misty-surge.effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to misty terrain.
misty-surge.shortEffect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Misty Terrain.
misty-surge.flavorText: Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

grassy-surge.name: grassy-surge
grassy-surge.effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to grassy terrain.
grassy-surge.shortEffect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Grassy Terrain.
grassy-surge.flavorText: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

full-metal-body.name: full-metal-body
full-metal-body.effect:
This Pokémon's stats cannot be lowered by other Pokémon's moves or abilities.  This effect only applies to normal stat modifications and not more exotic effects such as topsy turvy or power swap.

This Ability is not bypassed by mold breaker, teravolt, or turboblaze.
full-metal-body.shortEffect: Other Pokémon cannot lower this Pokémon's stats.
full-metal-body.flavorText:
Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from
lowering the Pokémon’s stats.

shadow-shield.name: shadow-shield
shadow-shield.effect:
When this Pokémon has full HP, regular damage (not fixed damage!) from moves is halved.

This ability cannot be nullified.
shadow-shield.shortEffect: When this Pokémon has full HP, regular damage from moves is halved.
shadow-shield.flavorText:
Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes
while its HP is full.

prism-armor.name: prism-armor
prism-armor.effect:
Super-effective damage this Pokémon takes is reduced to 0.75×.

This Ability is not bypassed by mold breaker, teravolt, or turboblaze.
prism-armor.flavorText: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

neuroforce.name: neuroforce
neuroforce.flavorText: Powers up moves that are super effective.

intrepid-sword.name: intrepid-sword
intrepid-sword.effect: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat the first time the Pokémon enters a battle.
intrepid-sword.flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat the first time the Pokémon enters a battle.

dauntless-shield.name: dauntless-shield
dauntless-shield.effect: Boosts the Pokémon’s Defense stat the first time the Pokémon enters a battle.
dauntless-shield.flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon’s Defense stat the first time the Pokémon enters a battle.

libero.name: libero
libero.effect: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s about to use. This works only once each time the Pokémon enters battle.
libero.shortEffect: Libero changes the Pokémon's type to that of its previously used attack.
libero.flavorText: Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's about to use. This works only once each time the Pokémon enters battle.

ball-fetch.name: ball-fetch
ball-fetch.effect: At any time after the first Poké Ball is thrown and fails to catch a Pokémon, at the end of a turn, if a Pokémon with Ball Fetch is on the field and not holding another item, it will pick up the same type of ball as the first one thrown.
ball-fetch.shortEffect: If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the Poké Ball from the first failed throw of the battle.
ball-fetch.flavorText:
If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch
the Poké Ball from the first failed throw
of the battle.

cotton-down.name: cotton-down
cotton-down.effect: When the Pokémon is hit by an attack, it scatters cotton fluff around and lowers the Speed stats of all Pokémon except itself.
cotton-down.shortEffect: When Ignores moves and abilities that draw in moves.
cotton-down.flavorText:
When the Pokémon is hit by an attack, it scatters
cotton fluff around and lowers the Speed stat of
all Pokémon except itself.

propeller-tail.name: propeller-tail
propeller-tail.effect: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon’s Abilities and moves that draw in moves.
propeller-tail.shortEffect: Ignores moves and abilities that draw in moves.
propeller-tail.flavorText: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's Abilities and moves that draw in moves.

mirror-armor.name: mirror-armor
mirror-armor.effect: Bounces back only the stat-lowering effects that the Pokémon receives.
mirror-armor.flavorText: Bounces back only the stat-lowering effects that the Pokémon receives.

gulp-missile.name: gulp-missile
gulp-missile.effect: When the Pokémon uses Surf or Dive, it will come back with prey. When it takes damage, it will spit out the prey to attack.
gulp-missile.shortEffect: If a Cramorant with Gulp Missile uses Surf or Dive, it catches prey and changes its form depending on its remaining HP.
gulp-missile.flavorText:
When the Pokémon uses Surf or Dive, it will come back
with prey. When it takes damage, it will spit out the prey
to attack.

stalwart.name: stalwart
stalwart.effect: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon’s Abilities and moves that draw in moves.
stalwart.shortEffect: Ignores moves and abilities that draw in moves.
stalwart.flavorText: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's Abilities and moves that draw in moves.

steam-engine.name: steam-engine
steam-engine.effect: Raises the user's Speed by three stages when it is hit by a Fire- or Water-type attack. The attack still deals damage.
steam-engine.shortEffect: Boosts the Speed stat drastically when the Pokémon is hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.
steam-engine.flavorText: Boosts the Speed stat drastically when the Pokémon is hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.

punk-rock.name: punk-rock
punk-rock.effect: Boosts the power of sound-based moves. The Pokémon also takes half the damage from these kinds of moves.
punk-rock.shortEffect: Boosts sound-based moves and halves damage from the same moves.
punk-rock.flavorText: Boosts the power of sound-based moves. The Pokémon also takes half the damage from these kinds of moves.

sand-spit.name: sand-spit
sand-spit.effect: The Pokémon creates a sandstorm when it’s hit by an attack.
sand-spit.shortEffect: Creates a sandstorm when hit by an attack.
sand-spit.flavorText: The Pokémon creates a sandstorm when it's hit by an attack.

ice-scales.name: ice-scales
ice-scales.effect: The Pokémon is protected by ice scales, which halve the damage taken from special moves.
ice-scales.flavorText: The Pokémon is protected by ice scales, which halve the damage taken from special moves.

ripen.name: ripen
ripen.effect: Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.
ripen.flavorText: Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.

ice-face.name: ice-face
ice-face.effect: When an Eiscue that's in its Ice Face form is hit by a physical move, it takes no damage and changes into its Noice Face form. If a hailstorm or snowstorm begins while Eiscue is in its Noice Face form, or if it is sent out in its Noice Face form during hail, it will immediately revert to its Ice Face form.
ice-face.shortEffect: The Pokémon’s ice head can take a physical attack as a substitute, but the attack also changes the Pokémon’s appearance. The ice will be restored when it snows.
ice-face.flavorText: The Pokémon's ice head can take a physical attack as a substitute, but the attack also changes the Pokémon's appearance. The ice will be restored when it snows.

power-spot.name: power-spot
power-spot.effect: "The power of moves used by the allies of the Pokémon with Power Spot is increased by 30%."
power-spot.shortEffect: Just being next to the Pokémon powers up moves.
power-spot.flavorText: Just being next to the Pokémon powers up moves.

mimicry.name: mimicry
mimicry.effect: Changes the Pokémon’s type depending on the terrain.
mimicry.shortEffect: Changes type depending on the terrain.
mimicry.flavorText: Changes the Pokémon’s type depending on the terrain.

screen-cleaner.name: screen-cleaner
screen-cleaner.effect: When the Pokémon enters a battle, the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil are nullified for both opposing and ally Pokémon.
screen-cleaner.shortEffect: Nullifies effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil.
screen-cleaner.flavorText:
When the Pokémon enters a battle, the effects of
Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil are nullified for
both opposing and ally Pokémon.

steely-spirit.name: steely-spirit
steely-spirit.effect: Powers up the Steel-type moves of the Pokémon and its allies.
steely-spirit.shortEffect: Powers up ally Pokémon's Steel-type moves.
steely-spirit.flavorText: Powers up the Steel-type moves of the Pokémon and its allies.

perish-body.name: perish-body
perish-body.effect: When the Pokémon with Perish Body is hit with a contact move, both the attacker and the Pokémon with Perish Body will faint in three turns.
perish-body.shortEffect: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.
perish-body.flavorText:
When hit by a move that makes direct contact,
the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns
unless they switch out of battle.

wandering-spirit.name: wandering-spirit
wandering-spirit.effect: The Pokémon exchanges Abilities with a Pokémon that hits it with a move that makes direct contact.
wandering-spirit.shortEffect: Swaps abilities with opponents on contact.
wandering-spirit.flavorText:
The Pokémon exchanges Abilities with a Pokémon
that hits it with a move that makes direct contact.

gorilla-tactics.name: gorilla-tactics
gorilla-tactics.effect: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move.
gorilla-tactics.shortEffect: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move.
gorilla-tactics.flavorText:
Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat but only allows
the use of the first selected move.

neutralizing-gas.name: neutralizing-gas
neutralizing-gas.effect: While the Pokémon is in the battle, the effects of all other Pokémon’s Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.
neutralizing-gas.shortEffect: Neutralizes abilities of all Pokémon in battle.
neutralizing-gas.flavorText: While the Pokémon is in the battle, the effects of all other Pokémon's Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.

pastel-veil.name: pastel-veil
pastel-veil.effect: Prevents the Pokémon and its teammates from being poisoned. It also cures teammates of poisoning when it enters the battlefield.
pastel-veil.shortEffect: Prevents the Pokémon and its allies from being poisoned.
pastel-veil.flavorText:
Protects the Pokémon and its ally Pokémon from
being poisoned.

hunger-switch.name: hunger-switch
hunger-switch.effect: The Pokémon changes its form, alternating between its Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode after the end of every turn.
hunger-switch.shortEffect: Causes Morpeko to change its form each turn, alternating between Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode
hunger-switch.flavorText: The Pokémon changes its form, alternating between its Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode after the end of every turn.

quick-draw.name: quick-draw
quick-draw.effect: If a Pokémon with this Ability selects a damaging move, it has a 30% chance of going first in its priority bracket.
quick-draw.shortEffect: Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.
quick-draw.flavorText: Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.

unseen-fist.name: unseen-fist
unseen-fist.effect: If the Pokémon uses moves that make direct contact, it can attack the target even if the target protects itself.
unseen-fist.shortEffect: Contact moves can strike through Protect/Detect.
unseen-fist.flavorText: If the Pokémon uses moves that make direct contact, it can attack the target even if the target protects itself.

curious-medicine.name: curious-medicine
curious-medicine.effect: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it scatters medicine from its shell, which removes all stat changes from allies.
curious-medicine.shortEffect: Resets all stat changes upon entering battlefield.
curious-medicine.flavorText: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it scatters medicine from its shell, which removes all stat changes from allies.

transistor.name: transistor
transistor.effect: Increases the power of Electric-type moves used by this Pokémon by 50%.

dragons-maw.name: dragons-maw
dragons-maw.effect: Increases the power of Dragon-type moves used by this Pokémon by 50%.

chilling-neigh.name: chilling-neigh
chilling-neigh.effect: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a chilling neigh, which boosts its Attack stat.
chilling-neigh.shortEffect: Boosts Attack after knocking out a Pokémon.
chilling-neigh.flavorText: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a chilling neigh, which boosts its Attack stat.

grim-neigh.name: grim-neigh
grim-neigh.effect: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a terrifying neigh, which boosts its Sp. Atk stat.
grim-neigh.shortEffect: Boosts Special Attack after knocking out a Pokémon.
grim-neigh.flavorText: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a terrifying neigh, which boosts its Sp. Atk stat.

as-one-glastrier.name: as-one-glastrier
as-one-glastrier.flavorText: This Ability combines the effects of both Calyrex's Unnerve Ability and Glastrier's Chilling Neigh Ability.

as-one-spectrier.name: as-one-spectrier
as-one-spectrier.flavorText: This Ability combines the effects of both Calyrex's Unnerve Ability and Spectrier's Grim Neigh Ability.

lingering-aroma.name: lingering-aroma
lingering-aroma.effect: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker’s Ability to Lingering Aroma.
lingering-aroma.shortEffect: Contact changes the attacker's Ability to Lingering Aroma.
lingering-aroma.flavorText: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker's Ability to Lingering Aroma.

seed-sower.name: seed-sower
seed-sower.effect: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.
seed-sower.shortEffect: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.
seed-sower.flavorText: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.

thermal-exchange.name: thermal-exchange
thermal-exchange.effect: Boosts the Attack stat when the Pokémon is hit by a Fire-type move. The Pokémon also cannot be burned.
thermal-exchange.shortEffect: Raises Attack when hit by a Fire-type move. Cannot be burned.
thermal-exchange.flavorText: Boosts the Attack stat when the Pokémon is hit by a Fire-type move. The Pokémon also cannot be burned.

anger-shell.name: anger-shell
anger-shell.effect: When an attack causes its HP to drop to half or less, the Pokémon gets angry. This lowers its Defense and Sp. Def stats but boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.
anger-shell.shortEffect: When the Pokémon's HP drops below half, Anger Shell lowers its Defense and Special Defense but its Attack, Special Attack and Speed are raised.
anger-shell.flavorText: When an attack causes its HP to drop to half or less, the Pokémon gets angry. This lowers its Defense and Sp. Def stats but boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

purifying-salt.name: purifying-salt
purifying-salt.effect: The Pokémon’s pure salt protects it from status conditions and halves the damage taken from Ghost-type moves.
purifying-salt.shortEffect: Protects from status conditions and halves damage from Ghost-type moves.
purifying-salt.flavorText: The Pokémon's pure salt protects it from status conditions and halves the damage taken from Ghost-type moves.

well-baked-body.name: well-baked-body
well-baked-body.effect: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Fire-type moves. Instead, its Defense stat is sharply boosted.
well-baked-body.shortEffect: Immune to Fire-type moves, and Defense is sharply boosted.
well-baked-body.flavorText: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Fire-type moves. Instead, its Defense stat is sharply boosted.

wind-rider.name: wind-rider
wind-rider.effect: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat if Tailwind takes effect or if the Pokémon is hit by a wind move. The Pokémon also takes no damage from wind moves.
wind-rider.shortEffect: Gives immunity to wind moves, and causes the Pokémon's Attack to increase by one stage when hit by one.
wind-rider.flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat if Tailwind takes effect or if the Pokémon is hit by a wind move. The Pokémon also takes no damage from wind moves.

guard-dog.name: guard-dog
guard-dog.effect: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat if intimidated. Moves and items that would force the Pokémon to switch out also fail to work.
guard-dog.shortEffect: Boosts Attack if intimidated, and prevents being forced to switch out.
guard-dog.flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat if intimidated. Moves and items that would force the Pokémon to switch out also fail to work.

rocky-payload.name: rocky-payload
rocky-payload.effect: Increases the power of Rock-type moves used by this Pokémon by 50%.

wind-power.name: wind-power
wind-power.effect: The Pokémon becomes charged when it is hit by a wind move, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.
wind-power.shortEffect: When hit by a wind move, the power of the next Electric-type move it uses is doubled.
wind-power.flavorText: The Pokémon becomes charged when it is hit by a wind move, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.

zero-to-hero.name: zero-to-hero
zero-to-hero.effect: The Pokémon transforms into its Hero Form when it switches out.
zero-to-hero.shortEffect: Transforms into its Hero Form when switching out.
zero-to-hero.flavorText: The Pokémon transforms into its Hero Form when it switches out.

commander.name: commander
commander.effect: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it goes inside the mouth of an ally Dondozo if one is on the field. The Pokémon then issues commands from there.
commander.shortEffect: Goes inside the mouth of an ally Dondozo if one is on the field.
commander.flavorText: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it goes inside the mouth of an ally Dondozo if one is on the field. The Pokémon then issues commands from there.

electromorphosis.name: electromorphosis
electromorphosis.effect: The Pokémon becomes charged when it takes damage, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.
electromorphosis.shortEffect: When hit by an attack, the power of the next Electric-type move it uses is doubled.
electromorphosis.flavorText: The Pokémon becomes charged when it takes damage, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.

protosynthesis.name: protosynthesis
protosynthesis.effect: Boosts the Pokémon’s most proficient stat in harsh sunlight or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.
protosynthesis.shortEffect: Raises highest stat in harsh sunlight, or if holding Booster Energy.
protosynthesis.flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat in harsh sunlight or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.

quark-drive.name: quark-drive
quark-drive.effect: Boosts the Pokémon’s most proficient stat on Electric Terrain or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.
quark-drive.shortEffect: Raises highest stat on Electric Terrain, or if holding Booster Energy.
quark-drive.flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat on Electric Terrain or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.

good-as-gold.name: good-as-gold
good-as-gold.effect: A body of pure, solid gold gives the Pokémon full immunity to other Pokémon’s status moves.
good-as-gold.flavorText: A body of pure, solid gold gives the Pokémon full immunity to other Pokémon's status moves.

vessel-of-ruin.name: vessel-of-ruin
vessel-of-ruin.effect: The power of the Pokémon’s ruinous vessel lowers the Sp. Atk stats of all Pokémon except itself.
vessel-of-ruin.shortEffect: Lowers Special Attack of all Pokémon except itself.
vessel-of-ruin.flavorText: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous vessel lowers the Sp. Atk stats of all Pokémon except itself.

sword-of-ruin.name: sword-of-ruin
sword-of-ruin.effect: The power of the Pokémon’s ruinous sword lowers the Defense stats of all Pokémon except itself.
sword-of-ruin.shortEffect: Lowers Defense of all Pokémon except itself.
sword-of-ruin.flavorText: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous sword lowers the Defense stats of all Pokémon except itself.

tablets-of-ruin.name: tablets-of-ruin
tablets-of-ruin.effect: The power of the Pokémon’s ruinous wooden tablets lowers the Attack stats of all Pokémon except itself.
tablets-of-ruin.shortEffect: Lowers Attack of all Pokémon except itself.
tablets-of-ruin.flavorText: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous wooden tablets lowers the Attack stats of all Pokémon except itself.

beads-of-ruin.name: beads-of-ruin
beads-of-ruin.effect: The power of the Pokémon’s ruinous beads lowers the Sp. Def stats of all Pokémon except itself.
beads-of-ruin.shortEffect: Lowers Special Defense of all Pokémon except itself.
beads-of-ruin.flavorText: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous beads lowers the Sp. Def stats of all Pokémon except itself.

orichalcum-pulse.name: orichalcum-pulse
orichalcum-pulse.effect: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle. The ancient pulse thrumming through the Pokémon also boosts its Attack stat in harsh sunlight.
orichalcum-pulse.shortEffect: Turns the sunlight harsh when entering battle, and boosts Attack while active.
orichalcum-pulse.flavorText: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle. The ancient pulse thrumming through the Pokémon also boosts its Attack stat in harsh sunlight.

hadron-engine.name: hadron-engine
hadron-engine.effect: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle. The futuristic engine within the Pokémon also boosts its Sp. Atk stat on Electric Terrain.
hadron-engine.shortEffect: Creates an Electric Terrain when entering battle, and boosts Special Attack while active.
hadron-engine.flavorText: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle. The futuristic engine within the Pokémon also boosts its Sp. Atk stat on Electric Terrain.

opportunist.name: opportunist
opportunist.effect: If an opponent’s stat is boosted, the Pokémon seizes the opportunity to boost the same stat for itself.
opportunist.shortEffect: Copies stat boosts by the opponent.
opportunist.flavorText: If an opponent's stat is boosted, the Pokémon seizes the opportunity to boost the same stat for itself.

cud-chew.name: cud-chew
cud-chew.effect: When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it will regurgitate that Berry at the end of the next turn and eat it one more time.
cud-chew.shortEffect: Causes the Pokémon to reuse an already consumed Berry at the end of the next turn.
cud-chew.flavorText: When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it will regurgitate that Berry at the end of the next turn and eat it one more time.

sharpness.name: sharpness
sharpness.effect: Increases the power of all 'slicing' moves by 50%.

supreme-overlord.name: supreme-overlord
supreme-overlord.effect: When the Pokémon enters a battle, its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are slightly boosted for each of the allies in its party that have already been defeated.
supreme-overlord.shortEffect: Attack and Special Attack are boosted for each party Pokémon that has been defeated.
supreme-overlord.flavorText: When the Pokémon enters a battle, its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are slightly boosted for each of the allies in its party that have already been defeated.

costar.name: costar
costar.effect: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it copies an ally’s stat changes.
costar.shortEffect: Copies ally's stat changes on entering battle.
costar.flavorText: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it copies an ally's stat changes.

toxic-debris.name: toxic-debris
toxic-debris.effect: Scatters poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team when the Pokémon takes damage from physical moves.
toxic-debris.shortEffect: Scatters poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team when the Pokémon takes damage from physical moves.
toxic-debris.flavorText: Scatters poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team when the Pokémon takes damage from physical moves.

armor-tail.name: armor-tail
armor-tail.effect: The mysterious tail covering the Pokémon’s head makes opponents unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.
armor-tail.shortEffect: Prevents the opponent from using any moves that have priority, such as Quick Attack.
armor-tail.flavorText: The mysterious tail covering the Pokémon's head makes opponents unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.

earth-eater.name: earth-eater
earth-eater.effect: If hit by a Ground-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.
earth-eater.shortEffect: Restores HP when hit by a Ground-type move.
earth-eater.flavorText: If hit by a Ground-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.

mycelium-might.name: mycelium-might
mycelium-might.effect: The Pokémon will always act more slowly when using status moves, but these moves will be unimpeded by the Ability of the target.
mycelium-might.shortEffect: Status moves go last, but are not affected by the opponent's ability.
mycelium-might.flavorText: The Pokémon will always act more slowly when using status moves, but these moves will be unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

minds-eye.name: minds-eye
minds-eye.effect: Mind's Eye enables the Pokémon with this Ability to hit Ghost-type Pokémon with damage-dealing Normal- and Fighting-type moves. It also prevents other Pokémon from lowering the Pokémon's accuracy and ignores changes to the opponents' evasion.
minds-eye.shortEffect: The Pokémon ignores changes to opponents' evasiveness, its accuracy can't be lowered, and it can hit Ghost types with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.
minds-eye.flavorText: The Pokémon ignores changes to opponents' evasiveness, its accuracy can't be lowered, and it can hit Ghost types with Normal-type and Fighting-type moves

supersweet-syrup.name: supersweet-syrup
supersweet-syrup.effect: A sickly sweet scent spreads across the field the first time the Pokémon enters a battle, lowering the evasiveness of opposing Pokémon.
supersweet-syrup.shortEffect: Once per battle, when a Pokémon with Supersweet Syrup enters the battle, it lowers the evasion stat of all adjacent opponents by one stage.
supersweet-syrup.flavorText: Lowers the evasion of opposing Pokémon by 1 stage when first sent into battle

hospitality.name: hospitality
hospitality.effect: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it showers its ally with hospitality, restoring a small amount of the ally's HP.
hospitality.shortEffect: When a Pokémon with Hospitality enters a battle, it restores HP for an ally by 25%.
hospitality.flavorText: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it showers its ally with hospitality, restoring a small amount of the ally's HP

toxic-chain.name: toxic-chain
toxic-chain.effect: The power of the Pokémon's toxic chain may badly poison any target the Pokémon hits with a move.
toxic-chain.shortEffect: May cause bad poisoning when the Pokémon hits an opponent with a move.
toxic-chain.flavorText: The power of the Pokémon's toxic chain may badly poison any target the Pokémon hits with a move

embody-aspect.name: embody-aspect
embody-aspect.effect: Embody Aspect boosts a particular stat, depending on the form of a Terastallized Ogerpon
embody-aspect.shortEffect: Embody Aspect boosts a particular stat, depending on the form of a Terastallized Ogerpon
embody-aspect.flavorText: The Pokémon's heart fills with memories, causing the Mask to shine and one of the Pokémon's stats to be boosted.

tera-shift.name: tera-shift
tera-shift.effect: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it absorbs the energy around itself and transforms into its Terastal Form.
tera-shift.shortEffect: When Terapagos enters the battle, it turns into its Terastal Form until the end of the battle.
tera-shift.flavorText: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it absorbs the energy around itself and transforms into its Terastal Form.

tera-shell.name: tera-shell
tera-shell.effect: The Pokémon’s shell contains the powers of each type. All damage-dealing moves that hit the Pokémon when its HP is full will not be very effective.
tera-shell.shortEffect: All damage-dealing moves that hit the Pokémon when its HP is full will not be very effective.
tera-shell.flavorText: The Pokémon's shell contains the powers of each type. All damage-dealing moves that hit the Pokémon when its HP is full will not be very effective.

teraform-zero.name: teraform-zero
teraform-zero.effect: When Terapagos changes into its Stellar Form, it uses its hidden powers to eliminate all effects of weather and terrain, reducing them to zero.
teraform-zero.shortEffect: As soon as Terapagos assumes its Stellar Form, it will immediately neutralize weather and terrain effects.
teraform-zero.flavorText: When Terapagos changes into its Stellar Form, it uses its hidden powers to eliminate all effects of weather and terrain, reducing them to zero.

poison-puppeteer.name: poison-puppeteer
poison-puppeteer.effect: When a Pokémon is poisoned by any of Pecharunt's moves, it will also become confused.
poison-puppeteer.shortEffect: Pokémon poisoned by Pecharunt's moves will also become confused.
poison-puppeteer.flavorText: Pokémon poisoned by Pecharunt's moves will also become confused.
